value:
$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|Well, Ephraim, it looks as though
you're stuck here, just like me.$k$pSorry to be blunt. If my brother were
alive to hear me talk like this, I'd get
an earful about diplomacy.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|You need not worry. I am not one for
formalities either. My father gave me
my fair share of lectures on that, too.$k$pAnd I suspect you're right, Hector. I
dreamt I heard a voice calling to me...
and I soon found myself here. You?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|The same. If it's a fight they want,
then we'll give it to them! No need to
hold back if they ask for it, eh?$k$pUntil then, though... We have no
choice but to cool our heels here.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|So it seems.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|I think I understand the sort of man
you are, Ephraim. I have an idea...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|You'd like to spar? That suits me
quite well. I'd have proposed it if you
didn't.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|I knew it! I think we'll get along just
fine, Prince. Now, time's wasting—$k$pBut look, just as we are set to
begin... These must be our
opponents.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|Damn strong, aren't they? I won't
give in that easily. Let's regroup.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|Agreed. I'm already looking forward
to fighting them again.$k$p$Sbs150|
